flights.notes: Directly with airlines or through Amex Travel

benefits.title: $120 Dining Credit
benefits.description: $10/month dinning credits for Grubhub, The Cheesecake Factory, Goldbelly, Wine.com, Milk Bar, and Shake Shack

benefits.title: $120 Uber Cash
benefits.description: $10/month Uber Cash for U.S. Uber rides/Uber Eats orders

benefits.title: $100 Hotel Credit
benefits.description: $100/year for two-night minimum stay at The Hotel Collection

benefits.title: Amex Offers
benefits.description: Enroll in Amex Offers and get extra rewards

benefits.title: American Express Experiences
benefits.description: Card Member-only events, exclusive access to ticket presales

benefits.title: American Express Preferred Access
benefits.description: Access to premium seats for select events

baggages.description: $1,250 for carry-on baggage, $500 for checked baggage

purchase.description: Reimburses up to $10,000 per purchase for loss within 90 days of purchase

extended-warranty.description: Extends the original manufacturer’s warranty up to one year

services.title: Global Assist® Hotline
services.description: 24/7 emergency assistance when traveling more than 100 miles from home

services.title: Send & Split®
services.description: Split the bill with friends and send money with Venmo or PayPal
